name: EcoRush
description:
A turn-based strategy game where a team of invasive animals face off against a team native species, each side aiming to capture all of their opponent's animals. Play worldwide campaign mode or one-off matches, against AI opponents or humans with hotseat multiplayer.

2nd place winner of the YoYoGames 2009 Save the Planet competition.

Lead Design: Andy Wiltshire
Programmer: Chris Conley
Programmer: Nick Koza
Pixel Art: Michael Elwin Setiadi
Music and Sound Effects: Jim Welch
